# svg-icon



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                                                                                                                                                                                          | Type     | Default       |
| ------------- | -------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ------------- |
| `ariaLabel`   | `aria-label`   | Specifies the label to use for accessibility. Defaults to the icon name.                                                                                                                             | `string` | `undefined`   |
| `flip`        | `flip`         | Specifies the direction if the icon should flip Available options are: `"x"`/`"h"`, `"y"`/`"v"`                                                                                                      | `string` | `undefined`   |
| `icon`        | `icon`         | A combination of both `name` and `src`. If a `src` url is detected it will set the `src` property. Otherwise it assumes it's a built-in named SVG and set the `name` property.                       | `any`    | `undefined`   |
| `name`        | `name`         | Specifies which icon to use from the built-in set of icons.                                                                                                                                          | `string` | `undefined`   |
| `rotate`      | `rotate`       | Apply a ratation on the icon Available options are: `"n"`, `"ne"`, `"e"`, `"se"`, `"s"`, `"sw"`, `"w"`, `"nw"` `"0"`, `"45"`, `"90"`, `"135"`, `"180"`, `"-135"`, `"-90"`, `"-45"` Default, `false`. | `string` | `undefined`   |
| `size`        | `size`         | The size of the icon in CSS units                                                                                                                                                                    | `any`    | `null`        |
| `src`         | `src`          | Specifies the exact `src` of an SVG file to use.                                                                                                                                                     | `string` | `undefined`   |
| `strokeWidth` | `stroke-width` | Apply a stroke width to the line of the icon Available options are 1-6 Applicable for variant `path` icons only                                                                                      | `any`    | `null`        |
| `variant`     | `variant`      | The variant name of the icon set to apply                                                                                                                                                            | `string` | `variants[0]` |
